title: NodeLand
description:
NodeLand: Revolutionizing Note-Taking with Dynamic Mind Maps

*Mind maps from documents:* Transform PDFs, DOCs, and TXTs into summarized mind maps, making complex information easier to digest.
*AI-Powered Mind Maps:* Get insights on any topic using the latest AI models, and improve your learning, brainstorming, and research.
*Mind maps from Scratch:* Build your own ideas from the ground up, gaining a bird’s-eye view to see how concepts interconnect.

Unlock the full potential of visual thinking.
